text: I Feel Good is the third studio album of Filipino actor and singer Daniel Padilla under Star Records, released on June 13, 2015 in the Philippines. This album consists of thirteen songs including covers such as James Brown's "I Got You (I Feel Good)" in which the album was named, Stevie Wonder's "Isn't She Lovely", James Taylor's "How Sweet It Is (To Be Loved by You)" and Andy Williams' "Moon River". Also included on the album are Padilla's versions of "Knocks Me Off My Feet", "For Once in My Life", "Morning Girl" and "Handog". This album also features his own version of "Ikaw ang Aking Mahal", "Pangako Sa 'Yo", the theme song to his teleserye with Kathryn Bernardo, and "Simpleng Tulad Mo". ==Background and development== On June 3, 2015, Star Music revealed the cover of this album."Look: Cover of new Daniel Padilla album revealed". Archived from the original on January 21, 2017. I Feel Good premiered on the international music streaming service Spotify on June 7, 2015."Daniel Padilla’s ‘I Feel Good’ to premiere worldwide on Spotify". Archived from the original on January 25, 2017."I Feel Good by Daniel Padilla". Spotify. Retrieved on January 25, 2017. ==Music video== The music video was shot on July 5, 2015"Photos: Daniel Padilla "I Feel Good" Music Video Shoot (Behind- The-Scenes)". Archived from the original. on September 10, 2015. and was released on September 11, 2015 and premiered on MYX the same day."Music: Star Music Releases Daniel Padilla's 'I Got You (I Feel Good) Music Video". Archived from the original on January 21, 2017. The music video debuted at No. 2 on the MYX Pinoy Countdown and at No. 5 at the MYX Hit Chart, then the following week peaked at No. 2 on both charts.Pinoy MYX Countdown: * "September 19 - September 25, 2015". Archieved from the original on February 12, 2017. * "September 26 - October 02, 2015". Archieved from the original on February 12, 2017.MYX Hit Chart: * "September 20 - September 26, 2015".Archieved from the original on February 12, 2017. * "September 27 - October 03, 2015". Archieved from the original on February 12, 2017. The music video for "I Got You (I Feel Good)" ranked #19 on the Pinoy MYX Countdown 2015 Yearender."Look: The Pinoy MYX Countdown 2015 Yearender Results!". Archived from the original on June 10, 2016 ==Promotion and reception== Padilla promoted the album during the Most Wanted concert. He performed some of the tracks from the album live, including "Isn't She Lovely", "How Sweet It Is (To Be Loved by You)", "Moon River" and "I Got You (I Feel Good)"."MOST WANTED PHOTOS: Daniel Padilla sings "Ikaw ang Aking Mahal" for Kathryn Bernardo". Philippine Entertainment Portal. Archived from the original on January 26, 2017. Padilla kicked off the I Feel Good album tour at Starmall Alabang on August 2, 2015."Daniel Padilla holds sold-out mall show for ‘I Feel Good’""Daniel Padilla holds sold-out mall show for ‘I Feel Good’". Archieved from the original on August 18, 2015.[https://twitter.com/roxsantos/status/627146522690367488/photo/1 "#IFeelGood first Album Tour!". Archived from the original on August 22, 2015. The tour continued to the Bren Z Guiao Convention Center, City of San Fernando on August 22, 2015."Daniel Padilla Road Tour Aug 22, 2015". Archived from the original on May 17, 2016. I Feel Good eventually reached gold status in less than a week. Padilla received the gold record award for I Feel Good from Star Music head Roxy Liquigan and the album producers on ASAP 20 on June 28, 2015."Daniel Padilla’s “I Feel Good” Album Achieves Gold Record Status In Less Than A Week!". Archived from the original April 29, 2016 This album peaked at number one on Odyssey Music & Video's nationwide sales reports from July 27 to August 2, 2015."Daniel Padilla’s ‘I Feel Good’ album tops music charts anew". Archived from the original on January 21, 2017"Daniel Padilla, No.1; Janella Salvador, No. 3". Archived from the original on December 25, 2015. The album earned a nomination at the 2016 PMPC Star Awards for Music for Pop Album of the Year and Cover Design of the Year."List: Winners, PMPC Star Awards 2016 – music". Archived from the original on November 22, 2016"Alden, Daniel, Sarah G and others nominated for Pop Album of the Year at Star Awards for Music". Archived from the original on December 20, 2016. The title track, "I Got You (I Feel Good)" earned a nomination at the 2016 Myx Music Awards for Favorite Remake, while Padilla was nominated for Male Pop Artist of the Year."KathNiel, Kim Chiu + more score nods at MYX Music Awards".
